title: Atma vicAram
sahitya:
Atma vicAram inri amaidi tAn varumO allarp-paDum manamE


anupallavi

  nAttikap-paDippAlum nAn enum taDippAlum Attirap-pEccAlum alankAra vIccAlum


caraNam    tannalap-pErAshai munnalam peTriDa dharaNi mahAnADugaL carccai sheidum ennE
unnata Atma nEya orumaiyinri ulaginar uLLattir-kalakangaL OyumO
